title: Im trying.. But I don't know what its trying to tell me....
body: Some friends.. might? be, online... maybe? But some.. aren't, but, still are... kind of...

replies.body:
So, friends who appear Online but are given the screen space of an offline friend.
Friends who appear offline but are ordered in the list as if they were online.
EDIT: I have mine sorted by Status, rather than alphabetically

So weird. How about the pop-up when you hover over their name in the friends list? I've had issues with the accuracy of those.

Idk, it's happening to me as well. Pretty sure they are offline if they show up like that? 
Temp fix is to turn offline friends on and off again, but it sneaks back to being weird again after game. 

Edit:  back on the quest for answers.
